shri lanka mesapandu krida sangamaya wisin sanwidhanaya karanu labana asok melwani anusmarana wiwrutha mesapandu surathawaliya heta (29) peradeniya jagath rajapaksha jathyanthara gruhastha kridanganaye di arambae.desambar 31 dina thek pura dina 3 k pawathwena me surathawaliya merata mesapandu krida surathawali athara pradhanathama surathawaliyak lesa salake.kantha saha pirimi wiwrutha eekala saha yugala, wiwrutha mishra yugala kantha saha pirimi, eekala wiwrutha prawinayange tharaga isaw (awurudu 35 – 45 wayas kandawala) kantha ha pirimi eekala wiwrutha awurudu 45 ta wadi kandaye tharaga isaw, awurudu 10 n pahala, 12 n pahala, 15 n pahala saha 18 n pahala balaka/balika eekala isaw washayen tharaga isaw 17 k me surathawaliyata athulathya.awurudu 10 – 12 saha 15 n pahala tharaga isaw da, kantha ha pirimi wiwrutha yugala, mishra yugala tharaga isaw da kantha ha pirimi prawinayange tharaga isaw da pilimalun pitudakime kramayata pawathwe.kantha ha pirimi wiwrutha eekala tharaga isawwa saha awurudu 18 n pahala balaka/balika tharaga isaw sudusukam labima tharaga, ardha awasan purwa tharaga washayen pawathwena athara ardha awasan purwa watayen thoraganu labana kridakayan athara lig kramayata tharaga pawathwa awasan tharagayata dedenaku thora ganimata niyamithaya.jathika kanishta ha jyeshta mesapandu tharagamalawata pera shrenigatha kirimwala ihala sthanayak athkara ganimata kridaka kridikawanta athi awasan tharagawaliya lesa da me tharagawaliya salake..
